achievements.title: Exalted Champion of Ironforge
achievements.description: Earn exalted status with and the right to represent Ironforge in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: Champion of Stormwind
achievements.description: Earn the right to represent Stormwind in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: Exalted Champion of Stormwind
achievements.description: Earn exalted status with and the right to represent Stormwind in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: Champion of the Alliance
achievements.description: Earn the right to represent every Alliance race's faction in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.description: Earn exalted status with and the right to represent every Alliance race's faction in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.description: Earn exalted status with and the right to represent every Alliance race's faction in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: Champion of Orgrimmar

achievements.title: Exalted Champion of Orgrimmar
achievements.description: Earn exalted status with and the right to represent Orgrimmar in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.description: Earn the right to represent Sen'jin in the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: A Silver Confidant
achievements.description: Earn both exalted status with The Silver Covenant and the right to represent a city in the Argent Tournament.
achievements.reward: Unlocks Silver Covenant dailies at the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: The Sunreavers
achievements.description: Earn both exalted status with The Sunreavers and the right to represent a city in the Argent Tournament.
achievements.reward: Unlocks Sunreaver dailies at the Argent Tournament.

achievements.title: The Sword in the Skull
achievements.description: Recover the missing hilt of Quel'Delar, draw the blade from its resting place, reforge the weapon, purify it in the Sunwell, and present it for your just reward.

achievements.title: Come One, Come All!
achievements.description: Attend the Darkmoon Faire.

achievements.title: Step Right Up
achievements.description: Play five different Darkmoon games.

achievements.title: Fairegoer's Feast

achievements.title: Grand Black War Mammoth

achievements.title: Scarab Lord
achievements.description: Opened the gates of Ahn'Qiraj.

achievements.title: Veteran of the Shifting Sands
achievements.description: Completed the gates of Ahn'Qiraj quest chain up to and including Treasure of the Timeless One (even if someone else ended up with the mount).

achievements.title: Venomhide Ravasaur

achievements.title: Yellow Brewfest Stein

achievements.title: It's Over Nine Thousand!
achievements.description: Earn more than 9000 achievement points.

achievements.description: Proud owner of the 2008 Vintage Blue Brewfest Stein.

achievements.description: Complete the Northrend daily dungeon quests listed below.

achievements.description: Proud owner of the 2009 Vintage Green Brewfest Stein.

achievements.title: Competitor's Tabard
achievements.description: Proud owner of a Competitor's Tabard from the 2008 Spirit of Competition event.

achievements.title: Proof of Demise
achievements.description: Completed the Northrend daily dungeon quests listed below.

achievements.title: Spirit of Competition
achievements.description: Proud owner of a Spirit of Competition pet from the 2008 Spirit of Competition event.

achievements.title: Clockwork Rocket Bot
achievements.description: Proud owner of the 2007 Vintage Winter Veil gift, the Clockwork Rocket Bot.

achievements.title: Crashin' Thrashin' Racer
achievements.description: Proud owner of the 2008 Vintage Winter Veil gift, the Crashin' Thrashin' Racer.

achievements.title: Gaudy Winter Veil Sweater
achievements.description: Proud owner of the 2011 Vintage Winter Veil gift, the Gaudy Winter Veil Sweater.

achievements.title: Operation: Gnomeregan
achievements.description: You assisted High Tinker Mekkatorque and the Gnomeregan Exiles in the recapture of Gnomeregan's surface.

achievements.title: Friends In High Places
achievements.description: Obtain a Zhevra mount through the Recruit-a-Friend program.

achievements.title: Zalazane's Fall
achievements.description: You assisted Vol'jin in the final defeat of Zalazane, recapturing the Echo Isles for the Darkspear trolls.

achievements.title: Friends In Even Higher Places
achievements.description: Obtain an X-53 Touring Rocket mount through the Recruit-a-Friend program.

achievements.title: Tripping the Rifts
achievements.description: Destroyed one of each type of elemental rift during the Cataclysm launch event.

achievements.title: Master of Arms
achievements.description: Raise four weapon skills to 400.

achievements.title: Tabard of the Protector
achievements.description: Obtained a Tabard of the Protector from the Dark Portal event.

achievements.title: Did Somebody Order a Knuckle Sandwich?
achievements.description: Raise your unarmed skill to 400.

achievements.title: Tabard of the Argent Dawn
achievements.description: Obtained a Tabard of the Argent Dawn from the Scourge Invasion event.

achievements.title: WoW's 4th Anniversary
achievements.description: Logged in during WoW's 4th Anniversary.

achievements.title: WoW's 5th Anniversary
achievements.description: Logged in during WoW's 5th Anniversary.

achievements.title: WoW's 6th Anniversary
achievements.description: Logged in during WoW's 6th Anniversary.

achievements.title: WoW's 7th Anniversary
achievements.description: Logged in during WoW's 7th Anniversary.

achievements.title: WoW's 8th Anniversary
achievements.description: Logged in during WoW's 8th Anniversary.

achievements.title: 1000 Dungeon & Raid Emblems
achievements.description: Loot 1000 Emblems of Heroism, Valor, Conquest, Triumph or Frost.

achievements.title: 2500 Dungeon & Raid Emblems
achievements.description: Loot 2500 Emblems of Heroism, Valor, Conquest, Triumph or Frost.

achievements.title: The Undying
achievements.description: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters in 10-player mode.

achievements.title: The Immortal
achievements.description: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters in 25-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Skill (10 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 25 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Mad Skill (10 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 45 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Insanity (10 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with 50 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Dedicated Insanity
achievements.description: Meet the criteria for A Tribute to Insanity without any raid member having used an item only obtainable from 25-player Coliseum, or any more powerful item.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Skill (25 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 25 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Mad Skill (25 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 45 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.

achievements.title: A Tribute to Insanity (25 player)
achievements.description: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with 50 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.

achievements.title: He Feeds On Your Tears (10 player)
achievements.description: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.

achievements.title: He Feeds On Your Tears (25 player)
achievements.description: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 25-player mode without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.

achievements.title: Champion of Ulduar
achievements.description: Defeat each boss in Ulduar in 10-player mode without allowing any raid member to die to that boss at any point during that raid lockout period.

achievements.title: Conqueror of Ulduar
achievements.description: Defeat each boss in Ulduar in 25-player mode without allowing any raid member to die to that boss at any point during that raid lockout period.

achievements.title: Herald of the Titans
achievements.description: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode at level 80 without anyone in the raid wearing any equipment with an item level higher than is available in 10-player Ulduar.
achievements.reward: Title Reward: Herald of the Titans

achievements.title: Zul'Gurub
achievements.description: Defeat Hakkar.

achievements.title: Deadliest Catch
achievements.description: Fish up Gahz'ranka in Zul'Gurub using the Mudskunk Lure.

achievements.title: Hero of the Zandalar Tribe
achievements.description: Earn exalted status with the Zandalar Tribe.

achievements.title: Agent of the Shen'dralar
achievements.description: Earn exalted status with the Shen'dralar.

achievements.title: Don't Want No Zombies on My Lawn

achievements.title: Bloom and Doom
achievements.description: Accomplish the following on the Peacebloom vs. Ghouls quest in Hillsbrad Foothills.

achievements.title: Zul'Aman
achievements.description: Defeat Zul'jin in the Zul'Aman raid.

achievements.title: Scourer of the Eternal Sands
achievements.description: Obtain the reins of the Grey Riding Camel from Dormus the Camel-Hoarder.
